sourcesContent:
export const HeroCarousel = (props) => { const pagesDefinition = require("../data/data.json"); return (

{pagesDefinition.titleCarousel}

{pagesDefinition.paragraphCarousel}

{pagesDefinition.buttonHero}
{props.data ? props.data.data.heroCarousel.map((d, i) => (

{d.title}

{d.text}

{pagesDefinition.buttonHero}
)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
